amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 116-392 to increase the amount for Puerto Rico disaster nutrition assistance to $210,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 116-392 to increase the amount for Puerto Rico disaster nutrition assistance to $210,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gonzalez-Colon (PR) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
